original_text: And if a woman has a husband who is not a believer and he is willing to live with her, she must not divorce him.
korean_text: 어떤 여자에게 믿지 아니하는 남편이 있어 아내와 함께 살기를 좋아하거든 그 남편을 버리지 말라

sentences.original_text: And if a woman has a husband
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 한 여자에게 남편이 있고

sentences.original_text: and he is willing to live with her
